t: AMAZON's APASS Network for Packaging Services | UL Solutions
s: UL Solutions is a member of Amazon’s APASS network serving vendors, sellers and manufacturers for testing and certification of their products to Amazon’s Packaging Programs.

t: Ships in Product Packaging for FBA - Amazon Packaging
s: The Ships in Product Packaging (SIPP) program, formerly known as Ships in Own Container (SIOC), offers sellers that use FBA the opportunity to test and qualify products to ship to customers in their own custom-brand packaging without any Amazon-added material.
